Tow Law See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4287.htm
Flower Show + Band Contest - Towlaw At a band contest which was held in connection with the Towlaw Flower Show, the following bands were the successful competitors: 1st, £12, West Hartlepool Operatic Brass Band (4th Durham Artillery Volunteers), Mr. T. Hogg conductor; 2nd, £7, Stanhope; 3rd, £4, Middlesbrough; 4th, £1, Towlaw.
Nov. 11, 2011, 4:03 p.m. Nov. 11, 2011, 4:08 p.m.
1 4th Durham Artillery Thomas Hogg
2 Stanhope Silver Unknown
3 Middlesbrough (Milburn's) Unknown
4 Tow Law Model Unknown
